participant_1.background:
I've had to give up a lot of my friends to pursue my dream of filmmaking.
My musical tastes will make me more relatable to my co-workers at the bank.
i love to eat meat.
I play disc golf because it's a good way to get exercise and spend time outdoors with my collie.
I'm worried about how we're going to make ends meet on one income.

participant_2.background:
My video game collection is my most valued material possession because it reminds me of the good times I had playing games with my family and friends.
i volunteer walking dogs twice a week.
i have been acting since i was ten years old.
I have a job that allows me to work from home so I can spend more time with my family.
my temper is pretty short.

content.text: It's going well, thank you! I'm looking forward to the weekend.
Me too! I'm going to be volunteering at the animal shelter.
That's great! I love animals. What kind of work do you do there?
I walk dogs and play with cats. It's so much fun!
I bet it is! I'm not very good with animals. I'm more of a gamer.
I love video games too! What's your favorite?
I like open world games like Skyrim and The Witcher.
Those are both great games! I'm more of a Mario fan myself.
Mario is a classic! I've always loved the games.
Me too! I've been playing them since I was a kid.
Me too! I have a lot of great memories playing Mario games with my friends.
Me too! I love making memories with my friends.
Me too! I'm so glad we met!
Me too! I hope we can hang out again soon.
Me too! We should exchange numbers.
Great! I'll send you a text message
